description: Thrift Store & Local Chaos Depot in Vancouver,Canada. Open daily 10AMâ€“8PM {D:A1,W:CW,w:F8G,P:RR,p:perlinNoiseNormal,mesh:3}

events.description: Maz spends 20 minutes color-sorting mugs that no one buys. Claims it's 'feng shui for capitalist ghosts.'
Unlabeled garbage bags show up. Today: 17 clown wigs, a taxidermy frog orchestra, and a signed VHS of Titanic (in Korean).
Clementine Calamity reads tarot for a customer using an old Smith-Corona. 'Death card. But like... in a cute way.'
Two hipsters debate whether a mustard yellow recliner is 'hideous or ironic-chic'. Nobody buys it. Again.
Kids and adults alike fiddle with ancient board games and a Furby that *shouldnâ€™t* be talking. It is. Nobody questions it anymore.
Clementine Calamity hosts a pricing & lipsync combo set. Crowd of tourists and regulars go wild when she finds a sequined blazer mid-performance.

events.summary: Sunday Rush of Softboys & Mushroom Girls
events.description: The brunch crowd floods in for ironic windbreakers and used poetry books. Maz hides behind the potted plant with a cinnamon bun.
At closing, someone trades a cursed porcelain doll for a copy of 'Twilight'. Maz names the doll Florence. Sheâ€™s now in the display window.
